padhūpāti：padhūpāyati，padhūmāti [pa-dhūpāyati，pa-dhūmāyati] 冒出煙（blow forth smoke），冒出火（blow forth flames）．aor．padhūpāsi，padhūmāsi，padhūpāyi，padhūmāyi； pp．padhūpita 已冒出煙的．
padhūpāti：padhūpāyati，padhūmāti [pa-dhūpāyati，pa-dhūmāyati] 煙を出す，火を出す．aor．padhūpāsi，padhūmāsi，padhūpāyi，padhūmāyi； pp．padhūpita 煙を出せる．

Padhūpāti，（=padhūpāyati） [pa+dhūpāyati] to blow forth smoke or flames Vin．I，25 （aor．padhūpāsi）； IV，109 （id．）； Vism．400 （id．），（so read for padhūmāsi T．，v．l．SS padhūpāyi & padhūmāyi）．-- pp．padhūpita （q．v．）．（Page 411）
